supporting_spans: M. de Villefort had scarcely said this, when the door opened, and Barrois appeared.
“Ah, how strange it seems that such a young and beautiful woman should be so avaricious.”
contradicting_spans: M. de Villefort had scarcely said this, when the door opened, and Barrois appeared.
reasoning: Contradiction (temporal): The evidence contradicts the claim that Noirtier married a gentle apolitical woman by showing that Villefort was already engaged to marry Valentine before he met d'Épinay.

analysis.claim_text: He married a gentle apolitical woman, hoping domestic peace would replace political strife, and pinned on his son Villefort the hope that the boy would carry his ideals forward.
